title: Neat on Paper
creator_credit: James Kesteven, Mandy King, Miriana Marusic and Sydney Filmmakers' Co-op Action Group
brief_description: The Sydney Filmmakers’ Co-operative was a major national agency for the distribution and exhibition of independently produced Australian film and video for over 20 years. This program examines the issues surrounding its closure in 1986.
creator_credit_for_label: James Kesteven, Mandy King, Miriana Marusic and Sydney Filmmakers’ Co-op Action Group
description: The Sydney Filmmakers’ Co-operative was a major national agency for the distribution and exhibition of independently produced Australian film and video for over 20 years. This program examines the issues surrounding its closure in 1986.
